FOUND IN: Aghast - Shocked or horrified by what one has seen, heard, etc.

CLUE: Image to which people are expected to conform
FOUND IN: Stereotype (could be negative if not fitting well)
Dame (another form of address for an elder woman, often used sarcastically or as part of panto tradition)
Bibbidi-Bobbidi-Boo (from "Cinderella," referring to the spell that turns her rags into a beautiful gown)
